name: Cuckoo Cycle
description: Cuckoo Cycle is the first graph-theoretic proof-of-work, and the most memory bound, yet with instant verification. Unlike Hashcash, Cuckoo Cycle is immune from quantum speedup by Grover's search algorithm. Cuckatoo Cycle is a variation of Cuckoo Cycle that aims to simplify ASICs by reducing ternary counters to plain bits.
